title: macOS Monterey 12.1 brings a huge list of new features, security fixes
content: Apple on Monday released macOS Monterey 12.1, a major update to macOS. The update is 2.36GB and requires a system restart upon installation.  The marquee feature of version 12.1 is SharePlay, Apple’s FaceTime feature that allows users to share media.
